LIVINGROOM.name: Living room
LIVINGROOM.desc: You are standing in the middle of the living room, trying to find a clean shirt to wear for class.

KITCHEN.name: Kitchen
KITCHEN.desc: You walk into the kitchen and notice you are out of cookies. You don't see any shirts.

BACKYARD.name: Back Yard
BACKYARD.desc: You step into the back yard to see your neighbor's dog has pooped on your side of the fence. There is no shirt in the back yard,

BATHROOM.name: Bathroom
BATHROOM.desc: You step into the bathroom and find that someone didn't flush. You can't find any shirts.

BEDROOM.name: Bedroom
BEDROOM.desc: You walk into your bedroom and sit on the edge of the bed next to the pile of dirty clothes. You look through the pile, but all the shirts smell horrible.

CLOSET.name: Closet
CLOSET.desc: You walk into your small closet and take a whiff of all the clean shirts hanging up. YOU DID IT!

GARAGE.name: Garage
GARAGE.desc: You step into your garage and see piles of cardboard boxes labeled as junk. You don't see any shirts.

FRONTYARD.name: Front Yard
FRONTYARD.desc: You step out into the front yard and see cars driving by. You don't see any shirts.
